item.create_bakery.cake_tin.tooltip.summ: The _Cake_ _Tin_ is used to produce _Cake_ _Bases_ for various _Cakes_. Pour the _Batter_ into the _Cake_ _Tin_ and cook to produce a _Cake_ _Base_ of that _Batter_ type.
item.create_bakery.small_cake_tin.toolti: The _Small_ _Cake_ _Tin_ is used to produce _Small_ _Cake_ _Bases_ for various _Small_ _Cakes_ and _Double_ _Cakes_. Pour the _Batter_ into the _Small_ _Cake_ _Tin_ and cook to produce a _Small_ _Cake_ _Base_ of that _Batter_ type.
item.create_bakery.half_cake_tin.tooltip: The _Half_ _Cake_ _Tin_ is used to produce _Half_ _Cake_ _Bases_ for various _Stuffed_ _Cakes_. Pour the _Batter_ into the _Half_ _Cake_ _Tin_ and cook to produce a _Half_ _Cake_ _Base_ of that _Batter_ type. The _Stuffed_ _Cake_ can then be assembled with a _Sequenced_ _Assembly_.
The _Gilded_ _Half_ _Cake_ _Tin_ is made to withstand the extreme heat of _Nether_ delicacies. Pour _Blazing_ _Batter_ into the _Gilded_ _Half_ _Cake_ _Tin_ and cook to produce an extremely hellish _Blazing_ _Half_ _Cake_ _Base_. The _Stuffed_ _Cake_ can then be assembled with a _Sequenced_ _Assembly_.
